ModMetaData.name: [CP] Rimmu-Nation - Security
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Impress your visitors with a new stock of Rimmu-Nation turrets and land mines.
Our selection ranges from briefcase sentry SMGs to modified Anti-Tank mines designed to activate against personnel; That oughtta keep your neighbour's dog from defacating in your lawn!
RIMMU-NATION, DEFENDING YOUR RIGHTS.
Credits: Dninemfive: Detonator and Claymore C# coding Tikubonn: Anesthetic gun coding JangoD'Soul: C4 texture
